title: 3.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a script in Scratch to show the life cycle of a butterfly or a frog. You are free to upload or draw the required sprites. In case you are using images from the internet, make sure they are not protected by copyright. If they are, then you must seek permission from the owner in order to use them.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

output = 11
